notes: You have been accepted to college. Now, how are you likely to purchase it? Students and families should vigilantly examine every one of the information within the award letters and plainly understand the letters' terms and conditions. Equally essential, try not to stress when the sum of money awarded is not enough to cover college costs. title: Financial Aid Award Words 101
